SELECT L47.REQST_NO, L47.TRNSC_TYPE, L47.TRNSC_TYPE_DTL, L47.PRIDIC_FRQNCY, TO_CHAR(L47.REQST_CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') REQST_CRT_DT, TO_CHAR(L47.REQST_REQUIRE_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') REQST_REQUIRE_DT, L47.REF_DOC_NO, L47.DOC_HDER_TXT, L47.GOODS_RCIPT, L47.RCIV_CDC_RDC, (SELECT WH_LOC_DESC FROM SYS0028M WHERE WH_LOC_ID=L47.RCIV_CDC_RDC) RCIV_CDC_RDC2, L47.REQST_CDC_RDC, (SELECT WH_LOC_DESC FROM SYS0028M WHERE WH_LOC_ID=L47.REQST_CDC_RDC) REQST_CDC_RDC2, L47.REQST_REM_, L47.RETN_DEFECT_RESN, L47.RETN_PRSN_CT_CODY, L47.CRT_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(L47.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') CRT_DT, L47.REQST_STUS, L47.REQST_DEL, L47.REQST_TYPE, L47.REQST_TYPE_DTL, L48.REQST_NO, L48.REQST_NO_ITM, L48.ITM_CODE, L48.ITM_NAME, L48.REQST_QTY, L48.UOM, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID=L48.UOM ) UOMNAME, L48.ITM_TXT, L48.REQST_DEL, L48.FINAL_CMPLT, L48.CRT_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(L48.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') CRT_DT, L48.UPD_USER_ID, L48.UPD_DT, L48.RCIPT_QTY, L48.BL_NO FROM LOG0047M L47, LOG0048D L48 WHERE 1=1 AND L47.REQST_NO=L48.REQST_NO AND L47.REQST_TYPE='PO' AND L47.RCIV_CDC_RDC =#{whLocId} AND L48.BL_NO = #{blNo} AND L48.ITM_CODE =#{matrlNo} AND L48.BL_ITM_SEQ=#{itmSeq} ORDER BY L47.REQST_NO

SELECT 'SMO' ||TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (REQST_NO, 10, 5) + 1), 'FM00000'), '00001') AS REQST_NO FROM LOG0047M WHERE SUBSTR (REQST_NO, 1, 9) = 'SMO'||TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')
mapper.update: MERGE INTO LOG0047M a USING dual on (a.REQST_NO=#{reqNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.REQST_CRT_DT = to_date(#{reqcrtdate}|| to_char(sysdate , 'hh24miss') , 'dd/mm/yyyyhh24miss') , a.CRT_USER_ID = #{userId} , a.CRT_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( REQST_NO, TRNSC_TYPE, TRNSC_TYPE_DTL, PRIDIC_FRQNCY, REQST_CRT_DT, REQST_REQUIRE_DT, RCIV_CDC_RDC, REQST_CDC_RDC, REQST_STUS, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, REQST_TYPE, REQST_TYPE_DTL ) VALUES ( #{reqNo} , 'UM' , 'UM03' , 'M' , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , #{flocation} , #{tlocation} , 'O' , #{userId} , SYSDATE , 'PO' , 'PO03' )
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO LOG0048D A USING DUAL ON (A.REQST_NO = #{reqNo} and REQST_NO_ITM = #{resnoitm}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.REQST_QTY = #{reqQty} , A.UOM = #{uom} , A.CRT_USER_ID = #{userId} , A.CRT_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( REQST_NO, REQST_NO_ITM, ITM_CODE, ITM_NAME, REQST_QTY, UOM, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, BL_NO, BL_ITM_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{reqNo} , (SELECT DECODE(COUNT(REQST_NO_ITM) , 0 , 1 , MAX(REQST_NO_ITM +1)) FROM LOG0048D WHERE REQST_NO = #{reqNo}) ,#{matrlNo} , #{stkdesc}, #{reqQty} , #{uom} , #{userId} , SYSDATE, #{blNo}, #{itmSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT 'DVR' ||TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (DELVRY_NO, 10, 5) + 1), 'FM00000'), '00001') AS DELVRY_NO FROM LOG0054M WHERE SUBSTR (DELVRY_NO, 4, 6) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOG0054M ( DELVRY_NO , TRNSC_TYPE , TRNSC_TYPE_DTL , DELVRY_DT , CRT_USER_ID , CRT_DT ) SELECT #{deliveryNo} , TRNSC_TYPE , TRNSC_TYPE_DTL , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'YYYYMMDD') , #{userId} , SYSDATE FROM LOG0047M WHERE REQST_NO= #{reqNo}
mapper.select: SELECT REQST_NO, REQST_NO_ITM, ITM_CODE FROM LOG0048D WHERE REQST_NO= #{reqNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOG0055D ( DELVRY_NO, DELVRY_NO_ITM, ITM_CODE, ITM_NAME, DELVRY_QTY, REQST_NO, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT ) SELECT #{deliveryNo} , (SELECT DECODE(COUNT(DELVRY_NO_ITM) , 0 , 1 , MAX(DELVRY_NO_ITM +1)) FROM LOG0055D WHERE DELVRY_NO = #{deliveryNo}), ITM_CODE , ITM_NAME, REQST_QTY , REQST_NO , #{userId} , SYSDATE FROM LOG0048D WHERE REQST_NO= #{reqstNo} AND REQST_NO_ITM = #{reqstNoItm} AND ITM_CODE = #{itmCode}

INSERT INTO LOG0063D ( SERIAL_NO, MATNR, LOC_ID, CRT_DT, CRT_USER_ID ) SELECT #{serial}, L55.ITM_CODE, L47.REQST_CDC_RDC, SYSDATE, #{userId} FROM LOG0055D L55,LOG0047M L47,SYS0026M S26 WHERE 1=1 AND L55.REQST_NO=L47.REQST_NO AND S26.STK_CODE= L55.ITM_CODE AND S26.SERIAL_CHK='Y' AND L55.DELVRY_NO=#{delno} AND L55.ITM_CODE=#{itmcd}
mapper.select: SELECT BL_NO ,BL_ITM_SEQ ,ITM_CODE ,SUM (REQST_QTY) REQST_QTY ,NVL (SUM (RCIPT_QTY), 0) RCIPT_QTY FROM LOG0048D WHERE BL_NO = #{blNo} AND BL_ITM_SEQ = #{itmSeq} AND ITM_CODE = #{matrlNo} GROUP BY BL_NO, BL_ITM_SEQ, ITM_CODE ORDER BY BL_NO, BL_ITM_SEQ, ITM_CODE
